solution.text:
Central angle for football \(= 90\) degrees
Central angle for tennis \(= 72\) degrees
Central angle for basketball \(= 18\) degrees
Observe that,
Central angle of football = Central angle of tennis + Central angle of basketball
i.e. \(90=72+18\)
Hence, the number of votes received by tennis and basketball together is equal to the number of votes received by football.

content.text:
Are the number of votes received by tennis and basketball together equal to the number of votes received by football?
Total number of votes \(=_{{j*5000}}_\)
